name: Block King
description: Blast the floor out from under your opponents' feet to send them to their doom; before they do the same to you. Will you risk an early loss to grab the power up and gain an advantage?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
